short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add reddit episode discussion as comment section to Crunchyroll and ADN

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a comment section to anime streaming websites like Crunchyroll and ADN (anime digital network). The comment section is anime episode discussion on the subreddit r/anime for the anime episode currently open in the browser.
